thread.title: Charles Fan
thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Charles Fan

author: Charles Fan
title: Charles Fan
text: I have recently had to file for bankruptcy and UpRight Law has been a tremendous help to me. They helped explain everything that has to be done, they helped put to rest any fears or concerns I had about this situation and any time I need to call and ask for help or advice they are always there and ready to help me. They are making this experience easy and helping take any stress I was having about filing bankruptcy away. I am a lot more at ease and looking forward to starting over and getting my life back on track again.
